product_name: AlpineAire Foods Himalayan Lentils & Rice - 2 Servings
long_description: The gluten-free AlpineAire Himalayan Lentils & Rice freeze-dried meal offers 2 tasty servings of rice, lentils and black beans, sweetly accented with mango, apples and sassafras.
short_description: The gluten-free AlpineAire Himalayan Lentils & Rice freeze-dried meal offers 2 tasty servings of rice, lentils and black beans, sweetly accented with mango, apples and sassafras.
